text.div:
ActMoodPredicate

Any of the above service moods (e.g., event, intent, or goal) can be turned into a predicate used as a criterion to express conditionals (or queries.) However, currently we allow only criteria on service events.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActMood where concept is-a _ActMoodPredicate
  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/ActMood
    CodeDisplay
    _ActMoodPredicateActMoodPredicateDefinition: An act that expresses condition statements for other acts.

name: ActMoodPredicate
description: Any of the above service moods (e.g., event, intent, or goal) can be turned into a predicate used as a criterion to express conditionals (or queries.)  However, currently we allow only criteria on service events.
